byline.original: By DANIEL J. WAKIN; Compiled by DAVE ITZKOFF

snippet: In a sign of potential conflict to come, the musicians of the New York Philharmonic have voted to authorize their representatives to call a strike, two orchestra members said on Friday.
lead_paragraph: In a sign of potential conflict to come, the musicians of the New York Philharmonic have voted to authorize their representatives to call a strike, two orchestra members said on Friday.
